title: Yankee Candle Scenterpiece at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: This stylish Scenterpiece Warmer from Yankee Candle features an attractive classic style. This base works as a warmer for Scenterpiece Wax Cups which are sure to provide refreshing scents for your home. Thanks for watching.
transcripts:
Hi, I'm Nancy with Bed Bath & Beyond, and I'd like to introduce you to the world's easiest wax melt system. It's the revolutionary Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup system from Yankee Candle. Now you can change scents in seconds without touching the wax. No mess. No cleanup. 

Yankee Candles are great quality, and they come in a variety of fragrances. This is really an amazing innovation, unlike anything else. And it's so beautiful. Just select a stylish Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup warmer from our exclusive range of handcrafted artisan designs made to enhance any decor. 

Next, choose your favorite Yankee Candle fragrance from over 30 of their most popular scents in these unique wax-filled Easy MeltCups. Then just place a cup in the warmer, flip the switch, and enjoy. What could be easier? Want a different scent? Just lift one cup out and drop another one in. 

Change scents in seconds without touching the wax. What could be simpler or neater? Once the wax cools, replace the lid and store the stack able Easy MeltCups for the next use. Each one gives you up to 24 total hours of great Yankee Candle fragrance. 

Start enjoying the world's easiest wax melt system today. The revolutionary Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup system from Yankee Candle is available online, and at a Bed Bath & Beyond store near you.
